.class public auto ansi VirtualizingStackPanel extends System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel implements class System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo

summary.span: 在水平或垂直的一行中排列并显示内容。

span.span: Arranges and virtualizes content on a single line that is oriented either horizontally or vertically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标准布局系统为与列表控件关联的每个项创建项容器并计算布局。The standard layout system creates item containers and computes layout for each item associated with a list control. "虚拟化" 一词指的是一种技术，通过该技术，用户界面 (UI) 元素根据屏幕上可见的项在多个数据项中生成。The word "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of user interface (UI) elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on-screen. 如果屏幕上只有几个元素，则生成多个 UI 元素可能会对应用程序的性能产生负面影响。Generating many UI elements when only a few elements might be on the screen can adversely affect the performance of your application. 计算可见项的数目，并使用 来自 (（如 或 ) ）来仅为可见项创建 UI 元素。The calculates the number of visible items and works with the from an (such as or ) to create UI elements only for visible items. 仅当面板中包含的项控件创建其自身的项容器时，才会发生这种情况。Virtualization in a only occurs when the items control contained in the panel creates its own item containers. 可以通过使用数据绑定来确保发生这种情况。You can ensure this happens by using data binding. 在创建项容器并将其添加到 items 控件的情况下，在 上不提供性能优势 。In scenarios where item containers are created and added to the items control, a offers no performance advantage over a . 是元素的默认项宿主 。 is the default items host for the element. 默认情况下， `VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing` 附加属性设置为 `true` 。By default, the `VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing` attached property is set to `true`. 将 `VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing` 附加属性设置为时 `false` ，的 行为与普通相同 。When the `VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing` attached property is set to `false`, a behaves the same as an ordinary . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 使用 Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) 绑定到 XML 数据源，并对元素中显示的项进行虚拟化。The following example shows how to bind to an XML data source and virtualize the items displayed in a element using Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML). 请注意， `VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing` 附加属性显式设置为 `true` 。Notice that the `VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing` attached property is explicitly set to `true`. [!code-xaml[VirtualizingStackPanel_Intro#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VirtualizingStackPanel_Intro/CS/default.xaml#2)] 下面的示例创建一个 ，并将 `VirtualizingStackPanel.VirtualizationMode` 附加属性设置为 。The following example creates a and sets the `VirtualizingStackPanel.VirtualizationMode` attached property to . [!code-xaml[RecycleItemContainerShippets#VirtualizationMode](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#virtualizationmode)] 下面的示例显示了上一示例中使用的数据。The following example shows the data used in the previous example. [!code-csharp[RecycleItemContainerShippets#ListBoxData](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#listboxdata)] [!code-vb[RecycleItemContainerShippets#ListBoxData](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#listboxdata)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标准布局系统为与列表控件关联的每个项创建项容器并计算布局。The standard layout system creates item containers and computes layout for each item associated with a list control. "虚拟化" 一词是指一种技术，通过该技术，可根据屏幕上可见的项，从更多的数据项生成一小部分 UI 元素。The word "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of UI elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on-screen. 如果屏幕上只有几个元素，则生成多个 UI 元素可能会对应用程序的性能产生负面影响。Generating many UI elements when only a few elements might be on the screen can adversely affect the performance of your application. 计算可见项的数目，并使用 来自 (（如 或 ) ）来仅为可见项创建 UI 元素。The calculates the number of visible items and works with the from an (such as or ) to create UI elements only for visible items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标准布局系统为与列表控件关联的每个项创建项容器并计算布局。The standard layout system creates item containers and computes layout for each item associated with a list control. "虚拟化" 一词是指一种技术，通过该技术，可根据屏幕上可见的项，从更多的数据项生成一小部分 UI 元素。The word "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of UI elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on-screen. 如果屏幕上只有几个元素，则生成多个 UI 元素可能会对应用程序的性能产生负面影响。Generating many UI elements when only a few elements might be on the screen can adversely affect the performance of your application. 计算可见项的数目，并使用 来自 (（如 或 ) ）来仅为可见项创建 UI 元素。The calculates the number of visible items and works with the from an (such as or ) to create UI elements only for visible items. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information |标识符字段 |IsVirtualizingProperty | |元数据属性设置为 `true` |无 ||Identifier field|IsVirtualizingProperty| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 XAML 绑定到 XML 数据源并虚拟化元素中显示的项 。The following example shows how to bind to an XML data source and virtualize the items displayed in a element by using XAML. 请注意，System.windows.controls.virtualizingstackpanel.isvirtualizing 附加属性显式设置为 `true` 。Notice that the IsVirtualizing attached property is explicitly set to `true`. ```xaml ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void LineDown() cil managed
abstract member LineDown : unit -> unit override this.LineDown : unit -> unit

summary.span: 将内容向下滚动一个逻辑单位。

span.span: Scrolls content downward by one logical unit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在派生类中重写此方法，以更改堆栈面板向下滚动内容的方式。You can override this method in a derived class to change how the stack panel scrolls content downward. 例如，可以将内容向下滚动两个单位，而不是一个。For example, you can scroll content down by two units instead of one. 如果需要物理滚动而不是逻辑滚动，请 在中包装， 并将其 属性设置为 `false` 。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the in a and set its property to `false`. 在这种情况下，将 提供滚动并禁用虚拟化。In this case, the provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当滚动时， 布局大小不会增长，但会有效地将其子代添加到 z 平面上，该平面通常由父元素剪裁 (通常 ) 到堆栈大小。When scrolling, does not grow in layout size, but effectively adds its descendants on a z-plane, which is normally clipped by a parent element (typically a ) to the size of the stack.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void MouseWheelDown() cil managed
abstract member MouseWheelDown : unit -> unit override this.MouseWheelDown : unit -> unit

summary.span: 向下逻辑滚动内容以响应鼠标滚轮按钮的向下单击操作。

span.span: Scrolls content logically downward in response to a downward click of the mouse wheel button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以 在派生类中重写，以更改堆栈面板响应鼠标滚轮向下滚动操作的方式。You can override in a derived class to change how the stack panel responds to the mouse wheel down action. 如果需要物理滚动而不是逻辑滚动，请 在中包装， 并将其 属性设置为 `false` 。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the in a and set its property to `false`. 在这种情况下，将 提供滚动并禁用虚拟化。In this case, the provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.

span.span: Called when an item that is hosted by the is re-virtualized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标准布局系统为与列表控件关联的每个项创建项容器并计算布局。The standard layout system creates item containers and computes layout for each item associated with a list control. "虚拟化" 一词是指一种技术，通过该技术，可根据屏幕上可见的项，从更多的数据项生成一小部分 UI 元素。The word "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of UI elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on-screen. 如果屏幕上只有几个元素，则生成多个 UI 元素可能会对应用程序的性能产生负面影响。Generating many UI elements when only a few elements might be on the screen can adversely affect the performance of your application. 计算可见项的数目，并使用 来自 (（如 或 ) ）来仅为可见项创建 UI 元素。The calculates the number of visible items and works with the from an (such as or ) to create UI elements only for visible items.

abstract member PageDown : unit -> unit override this.PageDown : unit -> unit

summary.span: 将内容向下滚动一页。

span.span: Scrolls content downward by one page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以 在派生类中重写，以更改堆栈面板对 page down 操作的响应方式。You can override in a derived class to change how the stack panel responds to the page down action. 如果需要物理滚动而不是逻辑滚动，请 在中包装， 并将其 属性设置为 `false` 。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the in a and set its property to `false`. 在这种情况下，将 提供滚动并禁用虚拟化。In this case, the provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.
